value.stringValue: This Opportunity is already Pending Approval to create a Bid

actionCalls.name: RFI_Compliance_Review_Auto_Approved_Toast
actionCalls.label: RFI Compliance Review Auto Approved Toast

value.stringValue: Your request for RFI Compliance Review has been auto-approved. The Bid has been created and a Bid/No Bid Call requested from the Bid Team.

actionCalls.name: RFI_Compliance_Review_Pending_Approval_Toast
actionCalls.label: RFI Compliance Review Pending Approval Toast

value.stringValue: Your request for RFI Compliance Review has been submitted to {!Get_Manager_Name.Full_Name__c} for Approval

actionCalls.name: RFP_Compliance_Review_Auto_Approved_Toast
actionCalls.label: RFP Compliance Review Auto Approved Toast

value.stringValue: Your request for RFP Compliance Review has been auto-approved. A Bid/No Bid Call has been requested from the Bid Team.

actionCalls.name: RFP_Compliance_Review_Pending_Approval_Toast
actionCalls.label: RFP Compliance Review Pending Approval Toast

value.stringValue: Your request for RFP Compliance Review has been submitted to {!Get_Manager_Name.Full_Name__c} for Approval

decisions.description: Was the Bid Team already set before this flow ran? If so then continue, otherwise write the Bid Team value selected by the user from screen into the field on Opp.
decisions.name: Bid_Team_Already_Set_Decision
decisions.label: Bid Team Already Set?

decisions.description: Is there already an active Compliance Review in Progress?
decisions.name: Compliance_Review_Already_in_Progress_Decision
decisions.label: Compliance Review Already in Progress?

decisions.description: If Flow was triggered as a Subflow then do nothing and return to the initial Flow. Otherwise refresh the page to avoid 'Your Flow Finished' message.
decisions.name: Ending_Behaviour
decisions.label: Ending Behaviour

decisions.description: If the Head of Bid is not already set then get the corresponding Head of Bid from the selected Bid Team and assign to the Opportunity.
decisions.name: Head_of_Bid_Set
decisions.label: Head of Bid Set?

decisions.description: Check that the Opp has Line Items before proceeding.
decisions.name: Opportunity_Services_Decision
decisions.label: Opportunity Services?

decisions.description: If the Opp record already has a Process Start date then the field is hidden for the user in this flow. As such need to only update the field value where it is shown to the user and value is completed.
decisions.name: Process_Start_Date_prepopulated
decisions.label: Process Start Date pre-populated?

decisions.description: Does the Opp have any Bid Phases associated to it? If not then show the user a warning prompting them to build out the timeline in full.
decisions.name: Timeline_Populated_Decision
decisions.label: Timeline Populated?

decisions.description: Was the record submitted for RFI Compliance Review or RFP Compliance Review?
decisions.name: Type_of_Compliance_Review_Submitted
decisions.label: Type of Compliance Review Submitted

Flow.description: Update from Running User Manager Name to Opp Owner Manager Name

formulas.description:
Formula to return Yes or NULL to be used as default value for Bid Required user option.
Return Yes if triggered by button (not subflow) and return NULL if triggered by Subflow to prompt the user to choose.
formulas.name: f_DefaultValue_BidRequired

Flow.interviewLabel: Opportunity: Submit for Compliance Review Screenflow {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: Opportunity: Submit for Compliance Review Screenflow

recordLookups.description: Get Manager Name for Toast Notification
recordLookups.name: Get_Manager_Name
recordLookups.label: Get Manager Name

recordLookups.description: Get Opp record's Bid Approval Status after the Approval Request has been submitted to check if it was auto approved or not. Store this field's updated value in recordId var.
recordLookups.name: Get_Opp_after_Approval
recordLookups.label: Get Opp after Approval

recordLookups.name: Get_Private_Sect_Head_of_Bid
recordLookups.label: Get Private Sect. Head of Bid

recordLookups.name: Get_Public_Sect_Head_of_Bid
recordLookups.label: Get Public Sect. Head of Bid

fields.name: Error_Message_DT
fields.fieldText:
We encountered an error when attempting to request Approval for the Creation of the Bid.


Please read the below error message. If it relates to something you are able to resolve yourself such as a misaligned date then please do so and then try again.


Error Message: {!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: Error_Message_ServiceLines_Message
fields.fieldText: You have likely received this error because the Opportunity does not yet have any Services. Please add some Services and try again.

rightValue.stringValue: No applicable approval process was found.

fields.name: Error_Message_DT2
fields.fieldText: If you are not able to resolve the error yourself then please raise a ServiceNow ticket (Report a Problem, Business Applications, Salesforce, Opportunities) including a link to the Opportunity and detail about the issue you're facing.

fields.name: No_Opp_Lines_Error_Message
fields.fieldText:
This Opportunity does not have any Opportunity Services. You must add all the necessary Services before submitting for Compliance Review.


Please add the required Services and try again.

fields.name: No_Timeline_Warning_Message
fields.fieldText:
Progress to Solution - Submit for Compliance Review


A timeline has not been added to this Opportunity. This is a prerequisite and must be completed before submission for Compliance Review.


Please add a timeline to this Opportunity to align with the procurement process outlined in the bid documents.

fields.name: Header_DT
fields.fieldText: Progress to Solution - Submit for Compliance Review

fields.name: Timeline_Completion_Checkbox
fields.fieldText: I confirm I have built out the timeline to accurately reflect the formal procurement timeline outlined in the documents

validationRule.errorMessage: Before requesting a Bid you must have completed the Timeline.

fields.name: SCOTSMAN_Completion_Checkbox
fields.fieldText: I confirm I have completed a SCOTSMAN (in Salesforce)

validationRule.errorMessage: Before requesting a Bid you must have completed a SCOTSMAN

fields.name: Deal_Plan_Completion_Checkbox
fields.fieldText: I confirm I have completed a Deal Plan (included at the below SharePoint location)

validationRule.errorMessage: Before requesting a Bid you must have completed a Deal Plan (outside of Salesforce).

fields.name: Applicable_Bid_Team
fields.helpText: Which Bid Team is most applicable to help work on this Bid?

fields.name: Next_Steps_Explanation_DT
fields.fieldText:
After you click Submit a Compliance Review request will be sent to {!recordId.Owner.Manager_Name__c}.


Once they've completed the review if it was successful then a request for a Bid/No Bid call will automatically be sent to the Bid Team.

variables.description: Input var set to TRUE if this flow is triggered as a Subflow. Affects finish behaviour.
variables.name: vInput_Subflow
